entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , St. Catharines
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 08:14 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Drifting Snow, -9.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: St. Catharines / Niagara District Airport 12:00 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
Condition: Drifting Snow
Temperature: -9.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.0 kPa rising
Visibility: 12.9 km
Humidity: 65 %
Wind Chill: -20
Dewpoint: -14.3°C
Wind: WSW 42 km/h gust 63 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Local blowing snow. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 80. High minus 4. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
